listing.listing_description:
King's Villa is a golfer's delight outside Scottsdale, Arizona, within easy reach of several renowned courses including Orange Tree, TPC Scottsdale, and Camelback. The home is perfectly designed and equipped for a memorable getaway with friends or family, featuring a private swimming pool, putting green, pool table, gourmet kitchen, and beautiful living and dining areas both indoors and alfresco. High-end media features (including a video game console) and air-conditioned interiors create a comfortable atmosphere for guests of all ages. Four ample bedroom suites plus a kid-friendly bunk room accommodate up to twelve guests.

Nestled amid high walls and lush trees, the villa's terrace offers a lovely venue for serene relaxation or festive celebrations. Step into the swimming pool for a refreshing dip and sunbathe under the clear Southwestern skies. Practice your short game on the lush green before enjoying some of the finest courses in the American West. Return to barbeques meals in the cool veranda and joyous nights under the desert stars.

The veranda flows gracefully into the villa’s interiors, with glass doors opening to a lovely billiard room and comfy TV den. The luminous kitchen features chef-grade appliances, a farmhouse-modern island, and a window bar opening to the veranda, easily serving both the outdoor and indoor dining tables. The spacious salon beside the dining room is perfect for evening cocktails or late-night movies.

The cavernous master bedroom is superbly appointed for a couple, with a king bed, private living area with fireplace and TV, bar area with wine fridge, walk-in closet, and fabulous indoor/outdoor ensuite bathroom. There are two large guestrooms with king beds and a shared bathroom, and a third room with queen bed and access to a hallway bathroom. All are furnished with premium linens and accouterments. The kids' room has two twin-size bunk beds, sleeping four children in all.

In addition to extraordinary golf courses, you're within ten to twenty minutes of wonderful hiking trails, superb spas, and myriad sporting opportunities. The cutting-edge art galleries and restaurants of Scottsdale are just eleven miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This fabulous mountain chalet is situated within Moonlight Basin at Big Sky Resort, about fifty feet from Natawista Run. Part of the Silvertip enclave—named by Architectural Digest among the world's "most beautiful hotel cabins"—the villa offers an exquisite balance of high-end contemporary design and rustic Montana comforts. Ample outdoor living areas include an open-air hot tub, while the superbly appointed interiors feature comfortable living and dining areas, a gourmet kitchen, and top-of-the-line media features. Three spacious and cozy bedrooms plus a kid-friendly bunkroom accommodate families and groups of friends up to ten in size. At extra cost, guests enjoy access to the wonderful amenities at Moonlight Basin Clubhouse, including its Jack Nicklaus Signature golf course.

The living room features high ceilings and large windows framing beautiful views of the mountains and forest. A lovely sofa faces the gas fireplace and flat-screen TV, while a glass doors opens to the summer lounge on the deck. The open kitchen features chef-grade appliances and serves a four-person bar and charming dining booth with banquette seating for six. Luminous white walls complement the rich wood accents, designer light features, superb contemporary artwork, and exquisite mountain light.

The bedrooms offer generous private havens for downtime and rest. The master suite opens to a balcony and features a king bed and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity and shower. Two queen guestrooms share a bathroom with dual vanity and shower, while the kids' room has two bunk beds (sleeping four) and access to a hallway bathroom with shower. Air conditioning and heating keep you comfortable in all seasons.

Natawista Run is just steps away, while the resort's base and town center are easily reachable by car. Walk about a minute to Moonlight Basin Cabin, featuring superb dining, a private outdoor pool, a fitness center, and a championship golf course. The chalet is also within easy reach of Big Sky Golf Course and Spanish Peaks Clubhouse, among numerous other attractions. The West Entrance of Yellowstone is about sixty miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Ski-chalet style shows off its contemporary side at Spruce Ledge. This newly built Breckenridge townhouse is a modern take on the Colorado mountain lodge, with spacious open-concept interiors and four bedrooms that can accommodate groups of twelve. Perhaps best of all, its location in the exclusive Shock Hill neighborhood is just steps from the BreckConnect gondola.

In warmer weather, you can take in views of the neighboring Cucumber Gulch Preserve from a private balcony with a barbecue, gas fireplace and al-fresco hot tub. After a day on the ski slopes, pour refreshments from the wine fridge or wet bar, flip on the cable TV or Sonos sound system, or share photos of your holiday with friends and family at home via Wi-Fi.

At the heart of this luxury vacation rental is a stunning great room with vaulted ceilings and picturesque forest views. The L-shaped layout puts the sitting and dining areas on either side and the fully equipped kitchen at the center. Throughout the open-concept space, details such as neutral-toned furnishings, a gas fireplace and marble countertops are both stylish and inviting.

Spruce Ledge has two bedrooms with king beds, including a master bedroom with its own gas fireplace, and one bedroom with a queen bed. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. For larger parties, there’s also a bunk room with two queen bunk beds and access to a hall bathroom.

A stay at Spruce Ledge puts you close to the best of the Breckenridge action. The villa is a 6-minute drive from the BreckConnect gondola, the nearest ski run and everything from souvenir shopping to honeymoon-worthy dinners on Main Street in Breckenridge. It’s also less than 10 minutes from sledding and tubing in Carter Park and, for true outdoor enthusiasts, great hiking and cross-country skiing in Cucumber Gulch Preserve.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
You don’t often think of a “downtown” atmosphere when you’re booking a ski vacation, but in Breckenridge, Colorado, the two contrasting environments exist in perfect harmony. With walking access to the shops, restaurants, and nightlife of Main Street and BreckConnect Gondola, you’ll be in the prime location for a day on the slopes and a night on the town. With three bedrooms and accommodations for twelve, Slope View Chalet is perfect for an extended family, or a group of friends on vacation together.

The classic ski chalet gets a modern-contemporary update at this stylish vacation rental. It’s still got the raw stone, exposed wood, and warm leather furniture of yesteryear, but with a sleek, minimalistic twist. A vaulted ceiling and two-storey window provides a spacious feel in the open concept living area. Form meets function in the stone fireplace that stretches the entire height of the living room, not only is it beautiful, but it houses both the gas fire and a flat screen television. Flowing onward to the kitchen, you’ll find granite countertops and high-end stainless steel appliances.

When dinner’s ready, the formal dining space has an artistic “picnic” style seating arrangement for eight. There’s also space for three more at the kitchen’s breakfast bar, and a barbecue outside on the balcony. Whether you’re feeling like spending more time outside in the hot tub or by the fire pit, or you’d prefer the warmth within, Slope View’s got everything you’ll need to make the most of your exciting ski vacation.

If you’re traveling with kids, Carter Park is under a mile from the chalet and it’s perfect for family fun. Spend an afternoon sledding and snow tubing in a picturesque environment, sure to excite the kids and the young at heart. Breckenridge Golf Club is another great way to enjoy the rugged mountain terrain while challenging yourself to a round on their championship eighteen.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched above the fourth green of Jack Nicklaus’ Beaver Course at Breckenridge Golf Club, Speyside Fairway offers its guests scenic mountain views, spacious common areas, and a stylish atmosphere that will elevate your next Luxury Retreats Ski Vacation. Located three minutes from the course, and ten minutes from Main Street and the BrekConnect Gondola, Speyside maintains a high level of privacy without sacrificing its proximity to Breckenridge’s most exciting attractions.

WIth four luxurious bedrooms, an open concept great room, and plenty of comfortable seating for the whole group, Speyside is perfect for family vacations or getaways with friends. The traditional vibe of a ski lodge isn’t lost on this trendy villa, its embraced and updated to meet the high standards of the most discerning modern luxury travelers. Only the finest electronics, appliances, fixtures, and finishes have gone into Speyside, and whether you’re planning a social night with friends or a quiet movie night with the family, you’re sure to appreciate the villa’s impressive ambiance.

Speyside Fairway is outfitted with a state of the art kitchen that features restaurant caliber appliances, gorgeous granite countertops, and a breakfast bar that invites a social atmosphere, even when preparing meals. After dinner, gather around the fireplace or post up at the wet bar to recount tales of an exciting day on the mountain. Outside, fire pit and hot tub are great places to relax, warm up, and enjoy the view.

Downtown Breckenridge is a hotspot for exciting mountain nightlife, with a wide range of restaurants, bars, live music venues, and nightclubs, all year-round. If you’re vacationing in the warmer months, you’ll find World-class golf, hiking, mountain biking, and rock climbing in Summit County. In the winter, it’s all about skiing. WIthin thirty-kilometers, you’ll be able to visit the slopes of Breckenridge Ski Resort, Copper Mountain, Keystone, and Vail.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
It’s all in the name at The View. This glorious Big Sky retreat delivers stunning panoramas from beautifully designed indoor and outdoor living areas. In the summer, use this vacation rental as a base to get out and explore Montana; in the winter, take advantage of ski-in, ski-out access to make first tracks.

Look out over Lone Peak from a furnished deck with al-fresco dining for ten and a private hot tub. After a day on the slopes, leave gear in the ski storage area and unwind with the help of the TV and Wi-Fi or cozy up to the gas fireplace. The villa is heated and has laundry facilities, but for summer visitors, air conditioning is not available.

Oversized windows bring The View into the open-concept great room of this luxury property, so you can watch the light move across the slopes of the mountains while curled up in the sitting area or swapping stories with friends and family around the dining table. The fully equipped kitchen is open to the rest of the room and features a convenient breakfast bar.

The villa has three bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite with a fireplace and its own balcony. There’s also one bedroom with a queen bed, twin bunk bed, kitchenette and shared access to a hall bathroom that could be used by parents and children or a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy. For larger parties, there’s an office space with a queen sofa bed and shared access to a hall bathroom.

No matter what time of year your holiday, you’ll find plenty to see and do in the Mountain Village area around the villa. When there’s snow on the ground, you can ski in and out to the White Otter lift; otherwise, it’s a short drive to a nearby clubhouse, golf course and the breathtaking Ousel Falls.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Put yourself only steps from the slopes at Argentiere 341. Part of the Chateau Chamonix complex, this newly renovated vacation rental offers ski-in, ski-out access to the Steamboat gondola and is within easy reach of shared amenities. Its open-plan living area and three spacious bedrooms are perfect for a getaway with friends or a relaxed family holiday in Steamboat Springs.

Guests of Argentiere 341 are welcome to use the shared pool, hot tub, barbecues and fitness center at Chateau Chamonix, as well as the communal ski storage. For quiet evenings in after a day on the slopes, the villa has its own private space with a TV, Wi-Fi and a cozy fireplace.

Vaulted ceilings and large windows give the villa’s open-plan great room a bright, airy feel, while a stone fireplace surround is a dramatic focal point. Stretch out on the sectional in front of the TV, seat up to eight around the dining table to relive the day’s adventures, or pause for a quick snack at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.

There are two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms at this luxury property: a master suite with a king bed and its own balcony, and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The third bedroom has two twin beds and shared access to a hall bathroom.

Not only does Argentiere 341 offer ski-in, ski-out access to the Steamboat gondola, but a shuttle service is included during all winter stays, making it easy to get to the slopes—or your après-ski activities. In warmer weather, make the 5-minute trip for a round at Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course. Be sure to leave time to visit some of Colorado’s natural wonders: the family-friendly Steamboat Springs Old Town, or the honeymoon-worthy hot springs in Strawberry Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Plan your Arizona holiday in a home custom-built for entertaining at Cholla. Its thoughtfully designed outdoor areas, finely detailed interiors and six bedrooms make this Scottsdale vacation rental perfect for a desert getaway or family gathering with groups of up to twelve. Spend your stay relaxing at this luxury property or taking advantage of several nearby golf courses.

Cholla's outdoor living spaces have everything you'll need to enjoy the hot, sunny days and cooler evenings, from a pool surrounded by sun loungers, covered patio and high-pressure mist system to a barbecue, living and dining areas with an al-fresco fireplace, and a hot tub.

Vaulted ceilings, pale wood floors crafted from Siberian oak and neutral tones give the villa's interiors an airy yet refined appeal. The heart of the residence is an open-plan great room with a sitting area, fully equipped kitchen, breakfast bar and breakfast nook, all connected to the terrace. A separate formal dining area has its own bar area, and a separate media room is a more intimate space to watch TV or a movie.

There are five bedrooms in the main house at Cholla: three with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms, one with two double beds and access to a hall bathroom, and one with a twin bunk bed. The property also has a separate guest house that's the perfect in-law retreat, family suite or even honeymoon-style escape, with a queen bed, twin bunk bed, and a full kitchen and living area.

With its sunny skies and array of challenging courses, Scottsdale is the ideal place to lower your handicap-and with four courses within a 10-mile drive of Cholla, it's easy. Practice a different kind of swing at the nearby Camelback Village Racquet and Health Club or take a hike through Echo Canyon Recreation Area. For shopping, dining and more, make the short drive to downtown Scottsdale or take a day trip into Phoenix.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A bohemian-modern retreat steps from downtown Palm Springs, Hinshaw Hideaway is the former winter escape of JCW and Wilberta Hinshaw, developers of the historic La Plaza shopping center. Built in 1934, the sprawling 3-bedroom, 3.5-bath ranch sits on landscaped grounds in the Movie Colony district, a 10-minute stroll from restaurants, galleries, and shopping. 

Styled in a mix of mid-century modern and Renaissance-era decor with modern technology throughout. Hinshaw Hideaway is an eclectic escape that invites relaxation. 

The home opens onto a cozy sitting area with a velvet ottomon facing a decorative fireplace, a unique church pew bench, and a stained-glass window. A colorful stained-glass chandelier hangs above a 6-seat dining table. Just off this room is a fully-equipped kitchen designed for entertaining, featuring stainless steel appliances, marble countertops and a wine fridge. 

Beyond the living area is a light-filled living room, which opens onto the expansive outdoor patio through sliding doors. On one end, a full-length leather sofa and two Herman Eames chairs, accented by fur, face a chic, glass-topped wet bar crafted with a natural finish and a live edge. A turntable sets the scene for entertaining. 

For the real entertainment, however, just step outside. A resort-style, heated swimming pool lies at the center of an impressive, South-facing backyard lined with palm trees and surrounded by a lush, 10-foot privacy wall. Soak in the sun in one of the cozy loungers along one end of the pool, or catch up with friends around on cushioned sitting area around a stone fireplace along the other. In a separate corner, a hot tub with 18 jets faces a second stone outdoor fireplace and outdoor bar area. 

Three more sitting areas surround the pool to provide ample room for entertaining, including a 6-seat dining table. With a BBQ grill and 6-seat outdoor dining table, you can easily enjoy dinner al fresco. 

Between three spacious bedrooms, Hinshaw Hideaway comfortably sleeps up to 6 guests. Each bedroom, located in a separate corner of the home for privacy, features a Casper Wave mattress and Casper pillows. The master suite, located off the East end of the living area, is styled in rustic, mid-century decor with wood-paneled walls, a king-sized bed and a leather lounge chair. This room also has a 55” flat-screen TV and a luxurious bathroom with marble walls and a soaker tub. The suite opens onto the backyard through glass doors, steps from a cushioned sitting area shaded by umbrellas. 

The second bedroom, located in the Southwest corner, is styled in eclectic decor with a stained glass door, and unique built-in desk. This bedroom has a Queen size bed and ensuite bath with a walk-in shower. 

The third bedroom, located on the Northwest corner, is whimsically styled with a four-post, king-sized bed, a Southwestern-style sofa and a decorative vintage TV. This room also has an ensuite bath and walk-in shower. A sliding glass door leads to the backyard. 

For added convenience, this home also features a private washer and dryer and an additional half-bath. A spacious driveway with charging station provides room for up to 3 cars, giving you the freedom to explore the surrounding desert, including Joshua Tree, located less than an hour away. 

Of course, with the restaurants, shops, galleries and parks of downtown Palm Springs opening a world of entertainment options for every mood a 10-minute stroll away, you can spend your vacation car-free. Walk to Wellness Park and meditate in the garden, wander through antique stores, or find an open tennis court at Ruth Hardy Park. 

Palm Springs City ID # 3458

listing.listing_description:
Stay in a mountainside haven of mid-century cool at Peak View Place. Part of the exclusive Home Run Trail development, this luxury townhouse offers ski-in, ski-out access to Northstar California Resort. Its three bedrooms and chic interiors are perfect for a winter getaway to Lake Tahoe with family or a group of friends.

This vacation rental has its own furnished outdoor living areas with a hot tub, barbecue and firepit, where you can while away summer evenings or indulge in a soak after a day of skiing. Inside, you’ll find an Apple TV, Wi-Fi, a gas fireplace and a wine cooler, as well as conveniences from laundry facilities to heating and air conditioning.

Floor-to-ceiling glass frames the views of mountains and forest in the open-concept great room. Watch TV in mod style in a sofa and lounge chair inspired by mid-century classics in the sitting area, or take a seat at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. A wall of cabinetry and matching wood floors give the space an inviting warmth.

Peak View Place has one master suite with a king bed and private en-suite bedroom, as well as two bedrooms with queen beds that share access to a hall bathroom. If you’re on holiday with the kids or need more flexible accommodations, there’s also a bunk room with two twin bunk beds where the younger set can giggle the nights away.

To give you the feeling of a honeymoon from everyday life, the villa offers ski-in, ski-out access to the Home Run ski run at Northstar, and is only a 10-minute drive from the resort’s base. For shopping and dining, make the 10-mile drive into downtown Truckee. And if you’ll be visiting during the summer, it’s less than a 10-mile drive to the nearest beach and the closest golf course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

TOT # 123228

listing.listing_description:
East Hampton is the social center for all the Hamptons, and this imposing modern homage to the Craftsman-style home is ideal for easy socializing. Entertaining centers around the heated saltwater pool where balconies and terraces view the extensive manicured grounds. Bring the chef to man the outdoor wood-fired oven for bespoke pizzas. The bartender whips up some frothy beverages while everyone pleasantly drifts in and out and about.

East Hollow Oasis is a short walk to the beach and East Hampton Village. Pack up the beach umbrella, sand pails, snacks, and the kids and flip-flop your way to the ocean. There’s nothing to compare with an East Hamptons sunny day on the beach. Kids can run, dogs can run after the kids. You can sit and do crosswords, or resume the story in the book from yesterday’s outing. The only white-noise here are seagulls, the ocean’s rhythm, laughter and barks of fun.

The Hamptons have many art galleries and museums. Great coffee shops, eateries, and bistros abound, plus several excellent ice cream and frozen yogurt shops too. It’s the perfect way to end a sand and sun beach day, anytime.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The views sweep from the Hollywood sign across downtown L.A. to the Pacific at the breathtakingly modern Beech Knoll. Featured in several magazines and on the AWE television network, this stunning three-bedroom vacation rental is just as memorable for its interiors as for its surroundings. Use this West Hollywood Hills luxury villa as a stylish private getaway, or as a base to shop, dine and sightsee on a holiday in greater Los Angeles.

Recently renovated by a tech entrepreneur, Beech Knoll has an array of thoughtful smart-home touches, from touch-screen panels for entertainment and lighting and a house-wide sound system to window shades that can automatically lower in strong sunlight. Start your day with a cup just the way you like it from the espresso machine, and end the evening with a glass from the wine fridge, sipped by the gas fireplace. Take in the panoramic views and enjoy the California sun from multiple balconies set with inviting lounge furniture.

The villa’s bright, modern interiors have landed it features on the Curbed real estate blog and in the Robb Report, a spot on Dwell magazine’s L.A. house tour, and a segment on AWE television’s Behind the Gates. Not only do large windows on all three levels of the house showcase the incredible views, but sliding glass walls let you open the indoor living spaces to the outdoor ones. Though the open-plan living and dining room and fully equipped Bulthaup kitchen are clean-lined and sleek, reclaimed wood and contemporary art are warm touches of texture and whimsical personality.

The master bedroom at Beech Knoll has features worthy of a honeymoon suite, from a king bed and stand-alone bathtub overlooking the city to an en-suite bathroom, private balcony and steam room. The other two bedrooms have queen beds and open to balconies; one has an en-suite bathroom and the other shares access to a hall bathroom.

Set on a quiet road just off the Sunset Strip, Beech Knoll offers both privacy and convenience. Guests are just a short drive from shopping on Rodeo Drive and at The Grove, concerts at the iconic Hollywood Bowl, the challenging Wilson & Harding Golf Course and the one-of-a-kind art collection at the Getty Center. Take a beach day in Santa Monica, Venice Beach or Malibu. If you’re traveling with family, the younger set will love a day trip to nearby Universal Studios or Disneyland.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Dream Maker Villa is a fabulous private home in Scottsdale, Arizona, about seven miles from the city's downtown district, and a short drive from several renowned golf clubs. Ideal for an unforgettable getaway with family or friends, the villa is loaded with amenities for relaxation and play, including an outdoor hot tub and swimming pool, a putting green, numerous game courts, superb living and dining areas, an alfresco bar, and two kitchens (indoor and outdoor). With five ample bedrooms—including a kid-friendly bunk room—the villa comfortably accommodates families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to fourteen in size.

The estate forms a private, resort-style oasis in the Arizona desert, surrounded by gorgeous mountain vistas. Enjoy games of volleyball, Frisbee golf, pickle ball, foosball, basketball, cornhole, and more, and practice your short game on the lush green. Bask in the sunlight on lounge chairs and plunge into the refreshing pool. Fire up the barbeque and mix cocktails at the bar, and gather for memorable meals in the fresh desert air. Sip wine around the fire pit at night, or crawl into the hot tub for a soak beneath the stars.

The interiors are beautifully furnished in a modern style, appointed with superb media technologies, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and multiple fireplaces. The centerpiece is a spacious and luminous kitchen, fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, gleaming white-marble countertops, and a breakfast bar. The separate entertainment room includes a classy pool table, fireplace, and TV lounge. The villa also features an office and gym.

The master bedroom includes a king bed and deluxe ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, rain shower, and freestanding tub. Three of the guest suites feature split-king beds that can be arranged as pairs of twins. Two of these rooms have ensuite bathrooms, while the third shares a bathroom with the bunkroom (which sleeps four children). There is also a twin-size bed and a trundle bed in the office. All of the rooms have air conditioning and TVs.

Dream Maker Villa is just four minutes from Orange Tree Golf Club, five minutes from Camelback Golf Club, and ten minutes from Paradise Valley Country Club. The downtown districts of Scottsdale and Phoenix are both within easy reach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Live the quintessential Palm Springs experience at La Paloma Palms. Nestled in the highly sought after neighborhood of Vista Las Palmas, this four-bedroom villa is one of the mid-century modern masterpieces known to locals as an Alexander house. Originally constructed in 1960, La Paloma has been redefined to modern standards of luxury and its West-facing orientation presents stunning views of the San Jacinto Mountains.

The villa’s outdoor spaces have the feel of a five-star resort. The sleek saline pool has both an integrated tanning shelf and spa tub. Bronze yourself under the California sun from the comfort of colorful chaise longues, or raise a sheltering parasol when the sun reaches its peak. A covered patio demonstrated the seamless integration of indoor and outdoor living. There you’ll find a living room set, perfect for easy afternoons with a book, plus a barbecue and wet bar for preparing dinner al fresco under the stars.

The interior displays hallmark features of Alexander homes, including open-plan rooms, clean lines, exposed wood beam ceilings and bright, airy rooms. You and your guests will enjoy unforgettable feasts in the dining room with a unique, triple panel sliding glass door facing the pool and mountains. A gas fireplace creates a cozy ambiance in the living room where you can watch movies or premium cable on a flat screen television. Test your culinary skills in the Chef’s kitchen where state-of-the-art appliances and smooth surfaces make cooking a pleasure.

Three of La Paloma’s bedrooms are found in the main house. The Master suite occupies a quiet corner. Within its spacious walls you’ll find a California King size bed, minimalist-chic décor, ample storage solutions and a large en-suite. It also opens out to a private patio. The second and third bedrooms are well-appointed with flatscreen televisions and custom blackout window treatments. The final bedroom is located in a charming, self-contained casita with kitchenette and seating area. It also houses a spa-quality en-suite.

When you’re ready to explore, you can start with easy walks around the neighborhood, marveling at the local architecture. The villa is a quick drive to historic Palm Canyon Drive, known as the Palm Springs “strip”. It’s lined with a diverse mix of shops, restaurants and galleries. If you’ve come to relax, you’ll find numerous world class spas nearby, while golfers can spend memorable days teeing off on the lush fairways of world-class courses.

Palm Springs Registered Tax Number: 3031

Palm Springs City ID: 2308

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Hatari Lodge is a custom luxury home located in the coveted Shock Hill neighborhood of Breckenridge. This outstanding Colorado chalet offers contemporary elegance alongside rustic mountain style. Perfect for a ski holiday or a summer retreat into nature, Hatari Lodge is also just a few minutes from the shopping, nightlife and restaurants of downtown Breckenridge.

Whether you want to have a barbeque or just relax and stargaze, Hatari Lodge has got you covered outdoors. Later on in the day, while the adults convivially enjoy some après-ski banter, the children can head upstairs to relax in the tiered theater seats to watch a movie or play video games in the impressive media room. At the end of the night, everyone will want to gather on the patio around the fire pit for smores or a soak in the hot tub while taking in the breathtaking views. This stunning vacation rental also features a red felt billiard table and a wet bar – perfect for the consummate entertainer in your entourage!

Walnut floors are complemented by vaulted ceilings constructed with massive timber beams and trusses throughout the main floor of this incredible private property with panoramic views in every direction. The main level boasts a spacious entertaining area and a gourmet kitchen that features top-of-the-line appliances, granite countertops, three sinks, a butler’s pantry and a breakfast bar. The adjacent formal dining area opens to a balcony.

Five stunning bedrooms decked out in quintessential lodge decor accommodate up to twelve guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms and televisions. You will find king beds in four suites and two twin bunk beds in the fifth. Both master suites offer rain showers and dual vanities. You will also find a jetted tub, walk-in closet and fireplace in one of the master bedrooms.

The Shock Hill neighborhood is just a three minute walk to the Gondola Mid Station. From here, guests of Hatari Lodge can take a short ride to the lifts at Peaks 7 and 8 or continue riding it all the way to town. Nordic skiers will be pleased to know that cross-country skiing trails abound in this fabulous location. The Breckenridge Golf Club is also just a few minutes away. Get the alpine holiday you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Cozy up just outside downtown Breckenridge at Brooks Hill Hideaway. Tucked away in a grove of pines, this charming five-bedroom vacation rental offers a quiet respite for up to fourteen friends or family members. But despite its secluded location, it’s a 10-minute drive or less from skiing, plus shopping and dining in the town’s historic center.

In the summer, return from a day of hiking or biking to heat up the barbecue and linger outside under the heat lamps. In the winter, watch the snow fall on the forest while soaking in the private al-fresco hot tub. Inside, you’ll find equally inviting amenities from a cable TV and Wi-Fi to a gas fireplace.

This luxury villa is a modern take on the mountain chalet, with a bright, open-concept great room at its center. The sitting area is laid out around a welcoming stone fireplace, and a breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen is the perfect spot to sit for a chat. You can also plan the next day’s adventures around one of two dining tables in the space, or let the kids watch a movie in the separate media room while the grown-ups catch up.

Brooks Hill Hideaway has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master bedroom with honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as a jetted tub. Two other bedrooms have a queen bed and double bed, respectively, and share a bathroom. The fifth bedroom is a bunk room with a twin-over-double bunk bed and a trundle bed.

If your Colorado holiday is focused on skiing, you’ll appreciate being just an 8-minute drive from the BreckConnect gondola and a 10-minute drive from the base of Breckenridge Ski Resort. And if not, you’ll enjoy being less than a 10-minute drive from shops, restaurants and the Breckenridge National Historic District.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This family-friendly villa, situated in a planned community just 10 minutes from Disney World, offers premium luxury and a dash of movie magic that kids will love. Themed bedrooms and a dynamic games room combine with a classic sun terrace, plush interior and pool to meet every need for both younger and older guests.

Get into the true spirit of a magical family break in Florida with a stay in this pristine new development close to the Reunion Resort. The home’s gentle blue and white color scheme runs through the shining, fully-equipped kitchen, spacious seating and TV area, and out to the shaded alfresco dining table. Towering green trees frame the blue pool, where a bubbling hot tub, water fountains and poolside games ensure guests of all ages can experience fun in the sun. After a day in the Florida sun, relax in the home theater before retiring to softly furnished bedrooms that ensure a great night’s sleep.

Both kids and adults will be spoilt for choice when it comes to local attractions. Reunion hosts an impressive range of diverse restaurants and entertainment. Guests will feel like they’re vacationing in Mickey’s backyard with the rides, restaurants and daily parades of world-famous Disney World just 10 minutes by car, with Universal Studios also a short drive away. The locality also boasts many nature and wildlife parks featuring Florida’s famous alligators.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spacious, stylish and close to almost everything, Paramount is tops for a Desert Cities holiday. Set behind the gates of an exclusive community in Indio, this chic five-bedroom vacation rental is a private retreat that’s just minutes from shopping, dining, golf and more. Reserve a stay with friends for the Coachella festival or tennis at Indian Wells, or with a group of extended family for a laid-back California getaway.

Spend your stay relaxing or entertaining in the resort-worthy backyard, which features a swimming pool, hot tub, lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and a firepit. Or head inside after sunset, pour a glass from the wine fridge and enjoy the media room, fireplace and Wi-Fi.

Taking inspiration from the area’s rich tradition of mid-century modern style, the villa’s open-concept great room pops with color, from the tomato-red sectional in the sitting area to the matching stools at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. There’s also a breakfast nook in the kitchen, as well as a separate formal dining room that seats eight.

There are four bedrooms in the main house at Paramount and one in a guest house. In the main house, you’ll find two bedrooms with California king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including the master suite, one bedroom with a bunk bed and twin bed, and one bedroom with a full bunk bed and twin bed. The two bunk rooms share a bathroom. And with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and terrace, the guest house gives couples the luxury of honeymoon-style privacy.

The villa is 5 miles or less from several golf courses, shopping and dining at charming Old Town La Quinta, the Coachella festival grounds and Indian Wells Tennis Garden, and 10 miles or less from even more golf courses and Palm Desert.

City ID # 20-00021226

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Choose ideal accommodation for your stay at the famed Olympic Valley with this comfortable and excellently-furnished option. Ideal for groups looking to ski the slopes of this Winter Olympics-hosting resort, settle into the comfortable living room, modern kitchen, top-tier bathroom and mountain view balcony. Close to the action and located in the lively resort, Lake Tahoe is a 15-minute drive.

This convenient option instantly welcomes guests with its warm and pleasant fireplace, creating a cosy atmosphere after a chilly afternoon on the ski-runs that rise over the town. Guests can make the most of the shining and modern kitchen, which comes totally equipped with modern appliances. In-house AC ensures that guests will be perfectly comfortable as they relax in the plush and pleasant living space, while touches of the culture and animals of the high Sierras are everywhere, from paintings of the West’s wildlife to sculptures and fixtures that recall the West’s diverse fauna. From the balcony, guests can take in the streets of the resort itself, and gaze out on the forested slopes of this renowned skiing community.

Being located in the ski village, it doesn’t get any better for skiers in the group. The locality offers a range of mature and excellent dining options, from American-fare eateries to more nuanced European options. The stunning landscape around Olympic Valley belies how close the resort is to other settlements, with the shore of crystalline Lake Tahoe being a mere 15-minute drive away, including the excellent public beaches of the locality. Fantastic outdoor options abound in the nearby wilderness, from hill-walking and mountain biking, to snow machine outings in Winter. Close by, the charming mountain town of Truckee to the north makes for a great day out.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located in the heart of downtown Ketchum, this stylish new building enjoys instant walking access to the city’s vibrant Main Street. As well, Kneebone Penthouse is situated just one block from the free shuttle to Sun Valley Ski Resort, so it’s easy to get around without a vehicle if your group decides to split up for the day. If you’re vacationing in the warmer months, Ketchum is also home to some excellent golf and exciting outdoor activities like hiking, rock climbing, and mountain biking.

Newly built, this industrial-chic apartment spares no expense when it comes to mountain village luxury. You’ll love lounging on plush designer furniture as you gaze out the floor-to-ceiling windows onto soaring mountain views. Return home each day to a roaring fire, warm wood tones, and stylish, modern decor. When it’s time to retire for the evening, your group of up to six will have either a king or queen sized bed and a lavishly adorned en-suite to enjoy, all with views of the village and distant mountain range.

Kneebone Penthouse comes with a fully equipped, modern kitchen with a social breakfast bar, and formal dining area. Guests will appreciate the state of the art appliances and electronics found throughout the villa, as well as Wi-Fi, cable television, and central air conditioning. In the summer months, Kneebone expands its hosting space out the balcony and rooftop patio, decorated with outdoor furniture, a bocce court, and spectacular mountain views.

Sun Valley and Dollar Mountain ski resorts are both located within a five-minute drive of the penthouse, so you’ll have no trouble hitting the slopes bright and early each morning. After a long day on the slopes, refresh and rejuvenate at Frenchman’s Bend Hot Spring, a favorite hangout among locals and vacationers alike. In the evening, Ketchum is home to lots of great restaurants, ranging from casual pubs to fine French, Italian, and American dining. If you’d prefer something a little more laid-back, check the show listings at the Magic Lantern Cinema or pop into Whiskey Jacque’s to check out some live music and a great selection of drinks.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Tanager House is an extraordinary alpine chalet at Big Sky Resort, just steps from Natawista Run and a minute's drive from Moonlight Basin Clubhouse (which guests can enjoy at extra cost). Situated within the Silvertip enclave—named by Architectural Digest among the world's "most beautiful hotel cabins"—the villa combines rustic alpine charm with sleek modern lines and high-end amenities, including a superb gourmet kitchen and lovely open-air hot tub. Majestic mountain views of the Madison Range, including Lone Peak and the Spanish Peaks, create an inspiring atmosphere both indoors and on the ample deck. Three king bedrooms plus a kid-friendly bunk room accommodate up to ten guests, ideal for families and large groups of friends.

The chalet's main living room features a high ceiling of pickled wood and ample mountain-view windows. Sumptuous sofas face the stone hearth with gas fireplace and mounted TV. The open floor plan leads gracefully to a granite dining table for ten and a gorgeous kitchen with granite countertops, beautiful wood cabinetry, and stainless steel appliances. Glass doors open from the living room to a spacious deck, ideal for barbeque grilling, sipping hot cocoa in the mountain air, or crawling into the hot tub for soothing relaxation.

The master suite opens directly to the deck with hot tub and features a four-poster king bed, TV, and ensuite bathroom. The guestroom on the main level includes a king bed, private sitting area, TV, and access to a hallways bathroom. The upper level features another king guestroom with TV and desk. The kids' bunkroom includes two bunk beds (sleeping four in all) and a cozy lounge. Heating and air conditioning ensure comfort in all season.

The chalet's private, one-car garage also serves a spacious storage room for skis, snowboards, bikes, and other equipment. Natawista Run is just steps away, and you're about a minute's walk from Moonlight Basin Clubhouse, which features a fitness center, outdoor pool, year-round outdoor sports offerings, and a fabulous Jack Nicklaus Signature Golf Course.

listing.listing_description:
World-class skiing awaits at this mountainside lodge hidden away in the Bachelor’s Gulch neighborhood, 6 minutes from Avon. Late nights with family and friends are all but guaranteed beneath the soaring-ceilings of this inviting, social setting. In the morning, hit the slopes with a 5-minute walk to Roughlock Ski Run at Beaver Creek. Vail, Copper Mountian, and Lionshead are nearby as well.  

On your way home, stop in at the Ritz Carlton’s pool and hot tub, where you’ll have shared access. Then, warm yourself by the imposing, natural stone fireplace after a day on the mountain. Before dinner, gather around the marble bar in the farm-style kitchen and recount tales from the ski slopes. Later, stretch out on the stately leather sofa and bask in the villa’s traditional alpine style. In the warmer months, move the party to the outdoor lounge and fire up the barbecue for lunch.  

In the summertime, Colorado’s rolling fairways, dynamic shifts in elevation, and tricky hole placement offer a challenge to golfers of every skill level. After a round, head to Avon or Beaver Creek for lunch at a craft brew-pub. Take the kids skating at the Beaver Creek Ice Rink. Then, drive 13-km to check out the newest ski gear, sit down for dinner, or dance the night away in Vail Village.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take a ski break close to both the mountains and Main Street at Morning Star Lodge in Breckenridge. Its location in the exclusive Highlands neighborhood puts you close to several ski lifts, downtown and even a golf course. With five bedrooms, spacious interiors designed by Suzanne Allen-Guerra and luxurious outdoor living spaces, the villa can welcome the whole family in comfort.

After a day on the slopes or the golf course, return to the lodge to relax in the hot tub, prep dinner on the gas barbecue, dine on the deck and cozy up to the outdoor gas fireplace. Inside, you’ll find a recreation room with a Wii, games table and shuffleboard, cable television and high-speed Internet access and a wet bar. Ski storage and a washer and dryer make it easy to stash and clean equipment.

The lofty interiors of Morning Star Lodge are rustic yet bright, with soaring ceilings and large windows with views of a pine grove and mountains. The double-height living room features cozy leather sofas and chairs gathered around a custom stone fireplace. The dining room, set between the living room and kitchen, is lined with tall windows and suede chairs to create a comfortable space that feels perched among the trees. The stunning kitchen is fully equipped and has a breakfast bar with rich leather stools.

There are two master suites at Morning Star Lodge: one on the main floor and one upstairs. On the main floor, the master bedroom has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet and patio access; on the upper floor, the master bedroom has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, mini-fridge and its own private entrance. The other three bedrooms are on the lower level: one with queen and twin beds, an en-suite bathroom and patio access; one with a double bed and shared bathroom and one with a twin bunk bed and shared bathroom. A twin trundle bed is also available in the fifth bedroom.

If you’ve come to the Rockies to ski, you’ll find the BreckConnect gondola 1.5 miles from the villa, the Snowflake and Quicksilver Super 6 lifts 2 miles away and the Peak 8 base at Breckenridge Ski Resort 3.5 miles away. Copper Mountain, 17 miles away, and Vail Ski Resort, 37 miles away, are well worth the drive. If the weather is warmer, head to Main Street, 1 mile from the villa, or Breckenridge Golf Club, 3.5 miles away. Upon arrival or departure, it’s a 103-mile drive from Denver International Airport to Morning Star Lodge.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Ski-in, ski-out access, a location close to Park City’s historic downtown and cozy modern interiors will have you applauding Mountain Symphony. One of the few homes with slopeside access to Park City Mountain Resort, this luxury Utah vacation rental makes it easy to enjoy a ski holiday with up to nine family or friends.

At the end of a day on the slopes, glide up to the house, leave your gear in the ski storage area and indulge in a soak in the private hot tub on the terrace, curl up by the gas fireplace, put a movie on the large projector screen or challenge other guests on the video game systems. In warmer months, enjoy the mountain views from the terrace while you wait for the barbecue to heat up, then serve drinks around the firepit while you watch the stars come out.

The great room of Mountain Symphony brings together country influences and modern style in harmony, with a vaulted ceiling, exposed beams, hardwood floors and large windows. In the sitting area, a soft sectional, cognac-hued leather chairs and a stone fireplace are a cozy grouping, with a vintage pair of skis adding a rustic note. The formal dining area in the center of the room seats six in appetite-whetting red chairs, and there’s more seating at the breakfast bar in the adjacent fully equipped kitchen.

Mountain Symphony has one bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms that share a bathroom with a queen bed and bunk bed, respectively. Larger parties can also use the twin bed and trundle bed in the den, which has an adjoining bathroom, for extra accommodations.

From the villa’s location on the playfully named Quit’N Time run at the Park City Mountain Resort, it’s just seconds to the nearest ski slope, a 5-minute walk to the Town Lift chairlift and a 5-minute drive to Deer Valley Resort. Make the 2-minute walk to Park City’s Main Street for an evening of shopping or a romantic, honeymoon-worthy dinner out, or the 5-minute walk to the town’s Sunday market. Take a break from skiing with an afternoon of skating at the local ice arena, marvel over a visit to Utah Olympic Park and, in warm weather, play a round or two at Park City Golf Club. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 38-mile drive from Mountain Symphony to the airport in Salt Lake City.

listing.listing_description:
Modern style meets timeless mountain scenery at Hawks Hideaway. Designed by California’s Pinnacle Design Studio, this luxury home puts a fresh spin on the ski-lodge look. Not only does its location afford incredible views of the peaks around Breckenridge, it puts you and up to twenty friends or family members just minutes from skiing, sledding and more.

There’s ample space at this Colorado vacation rental to entertain and relax. On warmer days, take in the views from the private deck, which has a barbecue, hot tub and firepit. In cooler weather, grown-ups will appreciate the sound system, wine fridge and fireplace, while kids will want to hang out in the lower-level media room.

The open-plan great room at Hawks Hideaway places living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen in one space that’s big enough for everyone. Picture windows overlooking the mountains and a stone fireplace provide dual focal points, and a sectional and built-in window seat are the perfect spots to take them in. Unique wingback chairs elegantly mark the head and foot of the dining table, which seats twelve. The kitchen has gourmet appliances, wide stretches of countertop and a convenient breakfast bar.

En-suite bathrooms in all six bedrooms ensure that everyone has a comfortable holiday. There are four bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with its own fireplace and balcony. The other two bedrooms, which each have two bunk beds, are ideal for kids.

Though Hawks Hideaway is tucked into a quiet pine grove, you can use the villa as a honeymoon from real life or to take advantage of the best of Breckenridge. Ski areas, sledding and tubing, and even golf are all just a short drive away. Don’t miss charming downtown Breckenridge, which has one of the largest historic districts in the state.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
